description.raw: I've noticed numerous improvements to the `ColladaLoader` that have been submitted both here and to `ign-common`. I believe the `gazebo::common::MeshManager` could be changed to use `ignition::common::ColladaLoader`, so I'm PIMPL-izing the `MeshManager` to simplify that process. I've also made the `ign-common3-graphics` component required, and included the `ign-common3-profiler` component as well. Since `gts` is a required dependency of `ign-common3-graphics`, we could also make it a required dependency of gazebo11, but the cmake find logic for gts on windows is [a bit complex](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/126d3fd87e884fc6b87e4b35e4bc1453f414ef12/cmake/FindGTS.cmake#lines-23:79), so I've left it as is for now.
description.html: I've noticed numerous improvements to the ColladaLoader that have been submitted both here and to ign-common. I've also made the ign-common3-graphics component required, and included the ign-common3-profiler component as well. Since gts is a required dependency of ign-common3-graphics, we could also make it a required dependency of gazebo11, but the cmake find logic for gts on windows is a bit complex, so I've left it as is for now.

title.raw: PIMPL-ize MeshManager, require ign-common3 graphics and profiler components
